constructorFillIn.description: To create an assignment, fill in its name and description, select its type and language, and search for a relevant image

constructorQuestionTypes.description: Make use of various types of questions to create your own unique assignment

constructorPreview.description: Preview the assignment before publishing to see what it is going to look like for your client

constructorDraft.description: Save your assignment as a draft to complete it later. Only you can see your drafts

constructorPublish.description: Once you Complete & Publish your assignment, it appears in the Library for everyone to use and can't be edited further
